title: Joe's Black T-Shirt: Short Stories About St. Louis
description: St. Louis is an amazing city where elitists, idealists, and pacifists co-exist with the disenfranchised, the amoral, and the secretly racist. Ignored, except by the brave who decide to live or the damned with no other choice, come thirteen stories that prove there is nowhere in the world like it.
author: Joe Schwartz
